column4: Airwulf: usually you can use update-rc.d which would help in case you missed a symlink
can anyone help me interpret this dmesg output? I've had mdadm fail a drive on my raid 5 set, and I'm curious as to what is actually being reported: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/31244/
I do not miss it. openvpn is started without any symlink and I do not know why. I will start openvpn only manually
you could always do find /etc -name 'openvpn' to be sure
